To the chief Musician<S>5329</S>, Altaschith<S>516</S>, A Psalm<S>4210</S> or Song<S>7892</S> of Asaph<S>623</S>. Unto thee, O God<S>430</S>, do we give thanks<S>3034</S>, unto thee do we give thanks<S>3034</S>: for that thy name<S>8034</S> is near<S>7138</S> thy wondrous works<S>6381</S> declare<S>5608</S>. <sup>Altaschith: or, Destroy not</sup> <sup>of: or, for</sup>
When I shall receive<S>3947</S> the congregation<S>4150</S> I will judge<S>8199</S> uprightly<S>4339</S>. <sup>receive: or, take a set time</sup>
The earth<S>776</S> and all the inhabitants<S>3427</S> thereof are dissolved<S>4127</S>: I bear up<S>8505</S> the pillars<S>5982</S> of it. Selah<S>5542</S>.
I said<S>559</S> unto the fools<S>1984</S>, Deal not foolishly<S>1984</S>: and to the wicked<S>7563</S>, Lift not up<S>7311</S> the horn<S>7161</S>:
Lift not up<S>7311</S> your horn<S>7161</S> on high<S>4791</S>: speak<S>1696</S> not with a stiff<S>6277</S> neck<S>6677</S>.
For promotion<S>7311</S> <S>2022</S> cometh neither from the east<S>4161</S>, nor from the west<S>4628</S>, nor from the south<S>4057</S>. <sup>south: Heb. desert</sup>
But God<S>430</S> is the judge<S>8199</S>: he putteth down<S>8213</S> one, and setteth up<S>7311</S> another.
For in the hand<S>3027</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> there is a cup<S>3563</S>, and the wine<S>3196</S> is red<S>2560</S>; it is full<S>4392</S> of mixture<S>4538</S>; and he poureth out<S>5064</S> of the same<S>2088</S>: but the dregs<S>8105</S> thereof, all the wicked<S>7563</S> of the earth<S>776</S> shall wring them out<S>4680</S>, and drink<S>8354</S> them.
But I will declare<S>5046</S> for ever<S>5769</S>; I will sing praises<S>2167</S> to the God<S>430</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>.
All the horns<S>7161</S> of the wicked<S>7563</S> also will I cut off<S>1438</S>; but the horns<S>7161</S> of the righteous<S>6662</S> shall be exalted<S>7311</S>.
